bibl.title: New and Old in the Ptolemaic Fayyum.

bibl.author: THOMPSON, Dorothy J.

bibl.note: The agricultural innovations and the impact of Greek settlement in the Fayyum under the early Ptolemies.
THOMPSON Dorothy J., New and Old in the Ptolemaic Fayyum.
